name: Puzzle Bowling
description:
Game


Puzzle Bowling - is a minimalistic puzzle game.
Just figures and a task to be solved. Nothing extra. No stars, no time limits, or anything like that.
The goal of each level is to throw all the pins off the table. For this,
need to use the interactive elements of the level. They will help find a solution for each level

Features


  • 100 levels
  • 4 types of interactive elements
  • Endless game
  • Simple and clean style
  • Without texts and other distraction elements

Trading cards
